description: The Originality.ai AI Checker plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the 'ai_get_table' function in all versions up to, and including, 1.0.12. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to read all data in the wp_originalityai_log database table, which can include post titles, scan scores, credits used, and other data.
